remarks: Convert an operation distributive law to class notation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2014.)
statement:
caovdir2d.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S /\ z e. S ) ) -> ( x G ( y F z ) ) = ( ( x G y ) F ( x G z ) ) ) $.
caovdir2d.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. S ) $.
caovdir2d.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. S ) $.
caovdir2d.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. S ) $.
caovdir2d.cl $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x F y ) e. S ) $.
caovdir2d.com $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x G y ) = ( y G x ) ) $.
caovdir2d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A F B ) G C ) = ( ( A G C ) F ( B G C ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
